name: Jayaraj S
responsibility_sentences: Communicating regularly with management and technical support colleagues
Designing and maintaining remittance and payroll systems integrated with core banking
Designing front-end screens and creating functionality per requirements
Developing web-based Anti-Money Laundering reporting systems for regulatory submission
Gathering and analyzing client requirements for application design
Implementing workflow and approval processes for financial applications
Making technical decisions to solve business challenges
Multi-tasking and switching tasks efficiently without loss of productivity
Providing comprehensive support to internal customers and resolving issues
Testing and validating application look, feel, and functionality
